sentences.sContent: One can no longer walk the streets without seeing beggars importuning passersby.
sentences.sCn: 走在这些街道上总能看到乞丐纠缠行人乞讨。

remMethod.val: im(进入) + port(搬运) + une → 向内搬 → 强求

trans.tranOther: If someone importunes another person, they ask them for something or ask them to do something, in an annoying way
